q: How do I maintain flood barriers in Naples' salty environment?

q: Can flood barriers be installed on historic Naples homes?

q: What flood zones require protection in Naples?
a: Zone AE (100-year floodplain) and Zone VE (coastal high hazard) require flood-resistant construction. Zone X (500-year floodplain) is recommended for protection. Our site surveys identify your specific zone and recommend appropriate barrier heights and anchoring systems.

q: Do Naples flood barriers qualify for insurance discounts?
a: FEMA-approved flood barriers may qualify for NFIP premium reductions of 5-45% depending on barrier type and installation method. We provide documentation for insurance submissions and coordinate with your agent to maximize savings.

q: How do I choose between permanent and removable flood barriers?
a: Permanent barriers offer maximum protection but require permits and affect aesthetics. Removable barriers provide flexibility for seasonal use and property sales. For Naples' storm season (June-November), removable barriers offer the best balance of protection and convenience.
